work.name: Best Western Port O'Call Hotel
work.summary: Managed procurement operations, supplier negotiations, and cost optimization.
highlights: Implemented a new vendor management system, reducing redundant administrative work and improving cost reporting.
Automated food and liquor costing, completely eliminating the need for manual data entry in cost reporting.
Consolidated food suppliers, leveraging competition to lower prices and secure back-end rebates.
Streamlined just-in-time deliveries to reduce overhead by 20%.

volunteer.summary: Filmed and produced live church services for livestreaming and social media.
highlights: Telling the story of Christ in creative and future forward ways.

courses: Advanced Seismic Data Processing - Thrust Belt Imaging

publications.name: Investigating the utility of airborne electromagnetic surveys for mapping local and regional hydrogeology in the Edmonton-Calgary corridor
publications.publisher: International Association of Hydrogeologists (IAG) - Regional Groundwater Conference Paper
publications.summary:
Airborne magnetic and electromagnetic (EM) data were collected between 2007 and 2010 as part of a large-scale 
mapping program designed to better characterize subsurface lithology in the Edmonton-Calgary corridor (ECC).

certificates.name: 3D Seismic Aquisition Design
certificates.issuer: Society of Exploration Geophysics (SEG) - Andreas Cordsen
